fields.name: Apparently Qualified (1x):
fields.value: Choose an investigative role to appear as to investigations, and a non-mafia evil faction for Close Encounter. This can be multitasked.

fields.name: Close Encounter (0x, 40%, Passive):
fields.value: 3 non-mafia players will appear to investigations as roles from the evil faction you chose. Their apparent roles will be equivalent to their actual Subalignments, or random if no equivalent exists. Ammo will be consumed passively every night to keep up this illusion, and the illusion will cease if you ever have insufficient ammo, but will reappear the next time ammo is consumed.

fields.name: Mounting Evidence (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocks if you place in the top 3. Choose either: a specific player to also appear as the non-mafia evil faction to investigations, or to have the cost of Close Encounter halved. You can do this any phase, and it can be multitasked. This may not be restocked by any means.

fields.name: Smoking Gun (0x, 185%):
fields.value: Choose a player, and an evil faction role. If they die and are flipped, this player will appear to have that role.
